snippet: California passed a sweeping package of gun control bills, but Gov. Jerry Brown vetoed a ban on semiautomatic rifles.
abstract: Democrats in the California Legislature pass sweeping package of gun control bills after a string of mass shootings across the country; Gov Jerry Brown, however, vetoes several key pieces, including a ban on semiautomatic weapons that many had considered the toughest restriction on gun ownership in the country; calls bill overly broad and says ban would have unduly constrained hunters and others using guns legally.
lead_paragraph: California passed a sweeping package of gun control bills, but Gov. Jerry Brown vetoed a ban on semiautomatic rifles.

headline.main: In California, New Package of Gun Laws but One Snag
headline.print_headline: In California, New Package Of Gun Laws But One Snag
